structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXII. IU-C, INDUSTRIAL DISTRICT, CONDITIONAL

text.section:
Sec. 33-274. Off-street parking.
All off-street parking areas shall be provided in accordance with applicable zoning regulations, and such off-street parking shall be located outside of areas which are allocated for any other use. Off-street parking shall be permitted within the setback areas as established in on the following basis:
Not closer than ten (10) feet to a side property line adjoining a side street.
Not closer than five (5) feet to an interior side or rear property line.
Off-street parking shall not be permitted within a twenty-five-foot setback distance from the front property line for the particular lot concerned.
